item.description:
March 20th is the official date that scooter season opens for the GBSC, the date we take back what is ours and kick off the best scooting season yet!

Those of you who are new to the club and wish to ride with us will need to complete a membership form and pay $20 at their first ride. All non-ride events are free for all to attend as always!
I'm putting this on hold till Paul is available


Paul
We will be heading to Douglas State Forest, and then sort of wind our way back where we will end up at Danny's Scooter Shop for there Open House which starts at 1:00PM
item.name: Take back the roads!
